game.name: SEARCH ALL - CHRISTMAS
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the Christmas candy in the form of a cane (caramel cane) on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling".
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the Christmas candy in the form of a cane (caramel cane) on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling".
